name: Exchanges
description:
All puzzles are solved by trading and combining items.

You'll only need the main mouse button or, on a touchscreen, your finger.

  • Click / Tap 
    • to focus
    • then another item or NPC to combine. 
  • Hold your click / long press 
    • to ask NPCs what they want.
  • Alternatively, drag and drop to combine an item with an item or NPC.

Art was created the day after the jam. A "Jam Reviewed" version is tagged in GitHub and available as a download.

Source Code: https://github.com/lunarcloud/exchanges-puzzle-game
